message.content:
I need to identify the total income from ordinary activities and its constituent line items, then decompose it into one component sub-item.

Looking at the income statement, I can see that "Total Revenue" is the line item that represents the total income arising from ordinary activities, with a value of 775598.77.

The constituent line item that makes up this Total Revenue is "Main Business Revenue", also with a value of 775598.77.

Since I need to decompose this into one component sub-item, and there's only one item that makes up the Total Revenue, I'll use "Main Business Revenue" as the sub-item.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '775598.77', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '775598.77'}}}
```
